Discord.Description: Discord is a free voice, video, and text chat app for gamers and communities, allowing users to create servers, join channels, and communicate with friends and groups

Telegram.Description: Telegram is a cloud-based instant messaging service that focuses on speed and security, allowing users to send messages, photos, videos, and files of any type

Zoom.Description: Zoom is a cloud-based video conferencing service that allows users to host and join online meetings, webinars, and virtual events with features like screen sharing, recording, and chat

WhatsApp.Description: WhatsApp is a free messaging app that allows users to send text messages, make voice and video calls, and share images, documents, and other media over the internet
